verses.name: Jonah 4:5
verses.text: So Jonah went out of the city, and sat on the east side of the city, and there made him a booth, and sat under it in the shadow, till he might see what would become of the city.

verses.name: Jonah 4:6
verses.text: And the Lord God prepared a gourd, and made it to come up over Jonah, that it might be a shadow over his head, to deliver him from his grief. So Jonah was exceeding glad of the gourd.

verses.name: Jonah 4:7
verses.text: But God prepared a worm when the morning rose the next day, and it smote the gourd that it withered.
